title: Get to Know Our Incoming Co-Host Olivia Muenter!
itunes:title: Get to Know Our Incoming Co-Host Olivia Muenter!
description:
This week, we’re getting to know Becca’s new cohost (starting April 6) Olivia Muenter! 

 

We talk to Olivia about her background, her initial thoughts when Becca approached her to be a co-host, what she’s most excited and nervous about joining the podcast, and topics she wants to discuss on the pod.

 

We also discuss more book-ish things like Olivia’s novel-writing process, her reading tastes, her dream reading setup, and what books she can read over and over again. 

 

Listen to our previous episode with Olivia here! 

 

Olivia’s favorite thrillers

In my Dreams I Hold a Knife by Ashley Winstead

I’ll Be You by Janelle Brown

Pretty Things by Janelle Brown

People Like Her Ellery Lloyd

The Club by Ellery Lloyd

 

Obsessions 

Grace: Billy Wilder Movies

Olivia: These Amazon Heels

 

What we read this week!

Grace:

Violeta by Isabel Allende

Liking Myself Back: An Influencer's Journey from Self-Doubt to Self-Acceptance by Jacey Duprie

Olga Dies Dreaming Xochitl Gonzalez

Becca: 

The Christie Affair by Nina de Gramont

The Club by Ellery Lloyd

Olivia: 

A Court of Thorns and Roses by Sarah J. Maas

One Night On The Island by Josie Silver

 

March Book Club Pick: Black Cake by Charmaine Wilkerson

April Book Club Pick: Project Hail Mary by Andy Weir

 

Sponsors:

Zocdoc - Go to zocdoc.com/bop to start your search for a top-rated doctor today. 

TrueBill - Start canceling unwanted subscriptions today at Truebill.com/bop. 

 

Join our Facebook group for amazing book recs & more!

 

Check out Bone Marry Bury. Available wherever you listen to podcasts. Visit Grace’s blog, The Stripe, and sign up for her email newsletter. 

 

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast. Follow Grace on Instagram @graceatwood, Becca @beccamfreeman, and Olivia at @oliviamuenter
